drupalNodeEvent.title: The Evolving Role of US and China in the Global Economy

field_speakers.processed: Former Australian Prime Minister Mr. Kevin Rudd, Former US Treasury Secretary and former Harvard President Lawrence Summers, President Jin Liqun of AIIB

field_organizers.processed: China Society, a student organization at Harvard Kennedy School

field_description.processed: ​This panel will discuss China’s rise within the current economic governance system that was shaped by US and other western countries after World War II, and the implications for the changing global economic dynamics.
